channel.title: How to change a npc hp? (508)
channel.description:
ok i got the source zooscape and i want to change it completely so i can say its my own but some credits go to zooscape i want to change a monster hp which drops d claws, and they can 1 hit d claws coz i made it like that sooo... i wanna make it more rarer to get.
thanks (508)
